1506800.name: Jurisdiction Soundtrack
1506800.description:
Experience the funky 1980s synths, chilling atmosphere, and pulse-pounding rhythms of the Jurisdiction original soundtrack.

With 59 minutes of fascinating tunes, this soundtrack paints a neon picture of life and crime in the big city that reaches from the cracked pavement all the way to the heights of a downtown penthouse.

Features theme music composed and performed by Mark Seibert, pioneer composer from the classic Police Quest series.
